recipesJson.name: Adams Normal View Remix
recipesJson.author: KAUZ514
recipesJson.description:
Well I will start by saying I've never had "Normal View" from Grimmgreens signature line but when I heard the description of "cranberry orange sugar cookie" I couldn't get the thought out of my mind. I wanted to eat and Vape that profile immediately! Went to order a bottle online and couldn't bring myself to do it so I added a couple flavours to my cart and waited for them to show up.
 Building this liquid was a surprising challenge but with a little help I was able to dial in the right percentages and flavours to create what I believe to be a near perfect Vape. 

Enjoy!

reviews.text: Cranberry and orange mash really well and great cookie base that the zeppola lifts to another level
